name: No Crypto For Old Men 7DRL
description:
NEW VERSION - This is the post-7DRL version that includes numerous improvements, bug fixes, and new quest content.

When President Trump required all servers to have backdoors for law enforcement, it was a gigantic gift to hackers like you! Now, every server in the country has a way in, and they're falling like dominoes. It's a hacker's paradise!

In this HTML5 roguelike set in an alternate universe where technology policy decisions have gone terribly awry, you move around the maze-like networks looking for ICE to fight and data to steal, trying to get the goods before sysadmins notice your activity and shut you down.

This game was created in less than a week for the 2016 "Seven-Day Roguelike" challenge (7DRL).
